      • Public Sub AddControlButton(ByRef currCBP As CommandBarPopup, ByVal strButtonCaption As String, ByVal strActionMacro As String, ByVal strCustomMacro As String, Optional blnBeginGroup As Boolean = False, Optional strFaceId As String, Optional strCustomFaceId As String, Optional strParameters As String)

        Public Sub AddControlButton(ByRef currCBP As CommandBarPopup, ByVal strButtonCaption As String, ByVal strActionMacro As String, ByVal strCustomMacro As String, Optional blnBeginGroup As Boolean = False, Optional strFaceId As String, Optional strCustomFaceId As String, Optional strParameters As String)
        Details:

        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
        '* Sub/Fn : AddControlButton
        '* Description : Add ControlButton with caption in CommandBarPopup
        '* Assign macro to this button. Set BeginGroup default to FALSE or as
        '* If is {Custom}, the Buttons are generated by running Custom Macro
        '* Created : 02-28-2013 10:07

      • Public Sub AddCuboidMenuSetting(ByVal vntMenuDetails As Variant)

        Public Sub AddCuboidMenuSetting(ByVal vntMenuDetails As Variant)
        Details:

        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
        '* Sub/Fn : AddCuboidMenuSetting
        '* Description : Add Control Popup Menu entries in MOUSE_CLICK_CUBOID_ACTION range for Cuboid.
        '* Menu entries to be added are passed as paramter.
        '* Since Menu entries are derived from MASTER_POPUP_MENU_ACTION i.e. Master Control Popup Menu settings,
        '* Formulas pointing to MASTER_POPUP_MENU_ACTION are used to create Cuboid Control Popup
        '* for Example, FORMULA_CA_TemplateMode, FORMULA_CA_MacroName etc.
        '* Created : 03-05-2013 16:31
        '* Modified: 03-05-2013 16:31
        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

      • Public Function GetMenuIdsForCuboidEvent(ByVal lngCuboidId As Long, Optional strOnSelection As String) As Collection

        Public Function GetMenuIdsForCuboidEvent(ByVal lngCuboidId As Long, Optional strOnSelection As String) As Collection
        Details:

        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
        '* Sub/Fn : GetMenuIdsForCuboidEvent
        '* Description : Returns collection of MenuIds for Cuboid and Event passed as parameter
        '* The settings made in 'mouseClickCuboidActions' are used to identify the MenuIds
        '* When TEMPLATE_MODE is DESIGN, all menus are displayed. This will allow to change ALL CONTROL POPUP realted settings in DESIGN mode.
        '* SCENARIO 1: User Mode -> Apply Setting : Need only Settings with IsActive = TRUE
        '* SCENARIO 2: Design Mode -> Apply Setting: Need only Rules with IsActive = TRUE
        '* SCENARIO 3: Design Mode -> Site Map : Need all Rules irrespective of TRUE/FALSE value
        '* **VIP NOTE** : is only used from SITEMAP so that Cell/Row level CONTROL Popup menus appear under respective Menu to allow user to Activate/Deactivate control popup setting
        '* Created : 02-18-2013 13:46
        '* Modified: 02-18-2013 13:46
        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
